version_description: • This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
• This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.

In this update, we've added more new features including the ability to:
• view and make payments to up to three different references for the same payee
• view more transactions on a revamped Account Details screen.

We've also fixed minor bugs and made some security updates.

We're constantly listening to your feedback! We're working hard to introduce new features and enhancements to improve your Mobile Banking experience.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

• Report your debit card lost or stolen
• Apply for a Personal Loan (iOS 11 and above)
• Minor bug fixes and improvements
• Minor bug fixes and improvements
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

• Ability to make payments to mortgage accounts
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

New Card Servicing features
• Temporarily block your debit and credit cards
• Enhancement to report lost or stolen – now available for credit cards as well as debit cards
• Replace damaged debit and credit cards

Improved personal loan application journey making it quicker and easier

Minor bug fixes and enhancements

In this update, we've added more new features including the ability to:
• view and make payments to up to three different references for the same payee
• view more transactions on a revamped Account Details screen.

We've also fixed minor bugs and made some security updates.

We're constantly listening to your feedback! We're working hard to introduce new features and enhancements to improve your Mobile Banking experience.

With this update, you can now:
• search through past transactions,
• view standing orders and Direct Debits, 
• get access to help topics and top queries through a new “Support” tab, and
• use an iPad in landscape mode.
 
We’ve also improved support for the iPhone X, as well as fixed some bugs and introduced security updates. Did you know we also recently added the ability to block and unblock a card in the app?
 
We're constantly listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience.

With this update, we’ve introduced a new way to keep you updated on new features and improvements. You’ll be able to see this when you first log into the app, or in the Support section.
 
We’ve also fixed more bugs to improve the app’s stability. 
 
We're constantly listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience!

With this update, we’ve improved navigation around the app helping you quickly access your standing orders and Direct Debits, and manage your money.
                           
You can now also find out more about our Credit Cards and Personal Loans from within Borrowing.
 
We're constantly listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience!

With this update, we’ve improved navigation around the app helping you quickly access your standing orders and Direct Debits, and manage your money.
You can now also find out more about our Credit Cards and Personal Loans from within Borrowing.

We're constantly listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience!

Thanks for using our app. Our latest update includes the following features and improvements:

• view pending transactions for current and savings accounts
• deposit a cheque into your accounts from your device
• bug fixes and security improvements
                
We always listen to your feedback, and are working really hard to improve your every day Mobile Banking experience.

Thanks for using our app. Our latest update includes the following features and improvements:
• view and download statements for current, savings and credit card accounts
• bug fixes and minor design improvements

We always listen to your feedback, and are working really hard to improve your everyday Mobile Banking experience.

This update makes it even easier to access your balances and make payments by introducing quick actions on the app icon. (Requires 3D Touch on iPhone 6s or higher). We've also fixed many bugs and made stability improvements.

We're constantly improving our app. Please send us feedback so we can make the most of your mobile banking experience.

• Minor bug fixes and improvements

We're constantly improving our app. Please send us feedback so we can make the most of your mobile banking experience.

This update includes minor bug fixes to improve the app’s stability. We’ve also made sending money easier to understand in-line with an industry-wide initiative.
                      
‪We’re constantly improving our app. Please send us your feedback so we can make the most of your mobile banking experience.

With this update, we’ve fixed bugs to improve app performance.

We’re constantly improving our app. Please send us your feedback so we can make the most of your mobile banking experience.

Our latest update makes it easier for you to move money and deposit cheques using our new Move Money hub.
 
We’re always listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience.

• Minor bug fixes and improvements
 
We’re always listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience.

You can now send money between your globally linked HSBC accounts with Global Transfers.
 
We’re always listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience.

You can now use your HSBC UK app to share your account information through Open Banking services.
 
We’re always listening to your feedback, and are working hard to improve your Mobile Banking experience.
In this update, we’ve added a new way for you to share your account information through Open Banking services.
• This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
• You can now use your HSBC UK app to view your documents, and make payments through Open Banking services.
• This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
You can now use your HSBC UK app to add your credit and debit cards to your Apple Wallet. We’ve also added the ability to make future dated payments through Open Banking services.
• This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
• This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
• This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.

You can now see your Balance After Bills in your Account details, making it easier to keep track of what you could have left after paying your monthly bills.
We’ve also improved how you make payments through Open Banking services, and fixed some bugs around the app.

You can now use your HSBC UK Mobile Banking app to restrict gambling transactions on your credit and debit cards, including Pay by Bank app. We’ve also improved how you make payments through Open Banking services, and fixed some bugs around the app.
This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes
• In this update, we’ve added a new way for you to stay informed and up to date with personal account messages.
This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.

• In this update, we've added a dashboard showing the consents you've given to third party providers through Open Banking. You can also now share your credit card account information through Open Banking services.
You can now use your HSBC UK Mobile Banking app to cancel Standing Orders and Direct Debits. We've also changed the way you make payments to new payees to help protect you from fraud.
You can now use your HSBC UK Mobile Banking app to see your pending debit card transactions in real time.
You can now use your HSBC UK Mobile Banking app to manage your current account overdraft or apply for a new one. It's also now easier to make a payment to your HSBC credit card.
This update includes small enhancements and bug fixes.
We’ve made some improvements to the Manage Cards section! You can now activate your credit and debit cards, and manage your credit limit on your credit card.
We’ve made it easier to switch your Digital Secure Key using QR codes when you get a new device.
Bug fixes and small enhancements.
Bug fixes and small enhancements.
We’ve made it easier to view and manage all your Direct Debits and standing orders in one place under Manage bills.
We’ve made it easier to view and manage all your Direct Debits and standing orders in one place under Manage bills.
•	You can now use your HSBC UK Mobile Banking app to view the PIN for your credit card.
• We've updated Move Money so you can now set up standing orders to your own accounts and existing payees.
You can now update your phone numbers and email address in Contact details.
You can now find out more about our Insurance products in the Products & Services section.
•	Bug fixes and small enhancements.
• Bug fixes and small enhancements.
• Bug fixes and small enhancements.
• Bug fixes and small enhancements.
• Bug fixes and small enhancements.
You can now find out more about our Investment products in the Products & Services section, and update your address in Profile.
